chapters.title: Chapter 15: A Pile of Sand
chapters.info: Kiruna Nachiman, p. 268 (372)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She is an elegant, statuesque woman, and is a sister to the King of Arafel. She has four Warders. She was sent, along with Bera, to establish diplomatic relations with Rand in the Aiel Waste.
